decision_conditions: T.1 Birch - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.2 Holly - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.3 Oak - 20% Crown thin & deadwood.	T.4 Oak - Lateral reduction to property boundary.
